Highlighted Projects

Evidence automation labs transforming manual audits into daily control verification.

AWS Compliance Labs Automation Suite

Ongoing

Series of GitHub Actions + AWS Lambda labs that schedule daily ISO 27001 evidence collection for CloudTrail, EC2, S3, and IAM controls.

  • Automated evidence generation across all AWS regions with zero manual steps.
  • Least-privilege GitHub-to-AWS federation with scoped IAM trust policies.
  • Evidence versioned to S3 for auditor-ready retrieval.
View Repository

Cloud Compliance Readiness Toolkit

Completed

FastAPI backend modeling SOC 2 / ISO 27001 / PCI DSS readiness engagements with control mapping, evidence tracking, and remediation workflows.

  • Control catalog maps frameworks to AWS labs and evidence types via YAML.
  • Project-based model for scoping client engagements with target frameworks.
  • Evidence linking connects lab outputs to specific controls for audit prep.
  • Remediation tasks track follow-up work with owners and statuses.
View Repository

PCI DSS Continuous Monitoring Dashboard

Completed

Real-time Streamlit dashboard for PCI DSS 4.0 compliance monitoring with trend analysis, findings tracking, and CSV export.

  • Executive summary with compliance score and pass/fail breakdown.
  • Drill into requirements with linked findings and evidence locations.
  • Trend analysis showing compliance posture over time.
  • Filterable findings list with auditor-ready CSV export.
View Repository

CloudTrail Multi-Region Validation (Lab 1)

Lambda-powered audit that ensures CloudTrail log coverage in every AWS region and writes JSON evidence to S3.

  • Maps directly to ISO 27001 A.12.4.1 (event logging).
  • Detects missing trails across commercial regions within minutes.
  • Scheduled via GitHub Actions for daily attestation.
Implementation

EC2 Asset Inventory & Scope Tagging (Lab 2)

Cross-region inventory script that classifies EC2 assets by scope and exports CSV evidence for ISO 27001 A.8.1.1.

  • Applies tagging logic to separate in-scope workloads automatically.
  • Daily CSV uploads to S3 with immutable versioning.
  • Hardened IAM trust policy restricting assume-role access to CI pipelines.
Workflow

IAM Access Review Automation

CLI tool that inspects IAM users and roles, flags wildcard permissions, and exports sign-off ready CSVs.

  • Reduced high-risk IAM findings by 72% following remediation cycles.
  • Highlights missing MFA and excessive privileges for rapid action.
  • Delivers auditable evidence packages to control owners.
View Automation

S3 Public-Access Detector (Planned ¬∑ Lab 3)

In Design

Upcoming Lambda + Security Hub integration that scans S3 buckets hourly and raises findings for public ACLs or bucket policies.

  • Creates Security Hub custom findings with High severity.
  • Closes the loop on data exposure guardrails.
  • Extends the automation suite toward continuous monitoring.

MFA Enforcement Audit (Lab 4)

Security Hub-driven control that verifies MFA coverage for console users and remediates gaps with workflow notifications.

  • Continuously evaluates IAM users for MFA compliance.
  • Creates Jira-style task JSON for remediation owners.
  • Maps to ISO 27001 A.9.2.3 and CIS AWS Foundations.

Security Group Drift Detection (Lab 5)

Lambda + Config rule combo catching overly permissive security groups and resetting guardrails automatically.

  • Flags 0.0.0.0/0 ingress on sensitive ports within minutes.
  • Opens GitHub Issues that track remediation status.
  • Supports ISO 27001 A.13.1.1 network controls.

Continuous Control Monitoring Hub (Lab 6)

Central dashboard orchestrating Config, Security Hub, and EventBridge rules for daily compliance evidence across accounts.

  • Aggregates pass/fail data into an S3 compliance lake.
  • Publishes executive-ready metrics to QuickSight.
  • Extends automation suite toward ISO 42001 alignment.

Automated IAM Role Review (Lab 7)

Scheduled Lambda that reviews AssumeRole activity for critical IAM roles and writes CSV evidence to S3.

  • Correlates CloudTrail AssumeRole events with scoped IAM roles.
  • Highlights unexpected principals for investigation.
  • Generates timestamped CSV reports for ISO 27001 A.9.1.2.
Lab 7 details

Monthly Audit Pack Generator (Lab 8)

Lambda job that bundles recent evidence from Labs 1‚Äì7 into a single ZIP audit pack with ISO 27001 mapping.

  • Scans S3 evidence prefixes for the last 30 days of artifacts.
  • Builds a compressed audit pack plus README_AUDIT_PACK.txt.
  • Speeds independent ISO 27001 reviews with one download.
Lab 8 details

ISO 27001 Control Dashboard (Lab 9)

End-to-end control dashboard that turns evidence and Security Hub findings into a single JSON + HTML view.

  • Summarizes evidence freshness by ISO 27001 control.
  • Pulls active Security Hub findings by severity.
  • Outputs a minimal dashboard for auditors and stakeholders.
Lab 9 details
